section.section: Subject to the provisions of its charter and § 2-311 of this subtitle, if authorized by its board of directors, a corporation may acquire the corporation's own shares.
Shares acquired under paragraph (1) of this subsection constitute authorized but unissued shares.

Shares of a corporation's own stock acquired by the corporation between the record date for determining stockholders entitled to notice of or to vote at a meeting of stockholders and the time of the meeting may be voted at the meeting by the holder of record as of the record date and shall be counted in determining the total number of outstanding shares entitled to be voted at the meeting.
